# Migration Docs

- [Migrate your .NET web app or service to Azure App Service](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/azure/migration/app-service.md): Learn about migrating a .NET web app or service from on-premises to Azure App Service.
- [Choose the right Azure hosting option](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/azure/migration/choose.md): Learn which Azure migration path is right for your ASP.NET web application.
- [Migrate a SQL Server database to Azure](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/azure/migration/sql.md): Learn how to migrate a SQL Server database from on-premises SQL Server to Azure.
- [Migrate an ASP.NET Web app to an Azure VM](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/azure/migration/vm.md): Learn how to migrate an ASP.NET Web application from on-premises to an Azure Virtual Machine.

## Topic Indices

- [Appcat](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/azure/migration/appcat/llms.txt): 8 topics
- [Appmod](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/azure/migration/appmod/llms.txt): 8 topics
